---
category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence finds patterns of mutations and survival in tumour images"
excerpt: "Scientists have used artificial intelligence to search for patterns of molecular abnormalities in tumour tissue sections across 28 cancer types. They analysed more than 17 000 tumour microscopy images and found that the appearance of tumour cells and tissues offers insights into the underlying genetic causes."
